summary: In recent years, we and others have raised questions about whether Veterans Health Administration has the clinical workforce to meet the health care needs of veterans in the U.S. Pacific territories of American Samoa, Guam, and the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands. We reviewed VHA vacancy trends and more. VHA employed 88 staff across the territories as of Sept. 2022, with most working in...
title: Veterans Health Administration: Hiring Trends in the U.S. Pacific Territories
